trans-unit.source: Please note that in IT, service has multiple meanings. In this definition, we'll focus on the more traditional one: service as in microservice. How or even if services differ from microservices is nuanced and different people may have different opinions. For a high-level definition, we'll treat them as the same. Please refer to the microservices definition.
